title: I Am Doppelganger - Novel Updates

tags: Antihero Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Demon Lord   Fantasy World   Fast Learner   Game Elements   Gods   Heroes   Humanoid Protagonist   Lovers Reunited   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Monster Girls   Multiple Identities   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Overpowered Protagonist   Playful Protagonist   Reincarnated as a Monster   Reincarnated in Another World   Ruthless Protagonist   Seven Deadly Sins   Shapeshifters   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Strong Love Interests   Suicides   Sword And Magic   Underestimated Protagonist   Wars

description:
A man was hit by a truck when he was trying to cross the road.
When he woke up he saw the goddess of death and the goddess gave him the power to be able to turn into anything.

Goblin? Fairy? Dragon?
Even a legend like King Arthur?  Si Pitung?
He can turn into everything!
With his new form, he started a new life in a new world.

[System Activated]
A strange sound was heard, a strange voice, the sound was driving him to a new world!

What will he do?>
